price: 111. Moominiiney уahuuduk Yallih Amri cine mari, tu-kalah tu-Siinil mabaaha sinni Arrabat Ada sin Aban ken Akke waytek, usun Qeb Siinit Aben ken tekkek Bukah derre siinit cabba heelon, tohuk lakal Siinil keenih cato takku waytam matan.
arabic: لَن يَضُرُّوكُمۡ إِلَّآ أَذٗىۖ وَإِن يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ يُوَلُّوكُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lan yaḍurrūkum illā adhan wa-in yuqātilūkum yuwallūkumu al-adbāra thumma lā yunṣarūna
